template.description: Create a dataflow to ingest input file data to Azure Data Lake Storagegen2.
template.name: ingest_into_adls

labels.label: Configure the ADLS credentials, file system name & folder name
Add an output Dir path for parquet files
Define appropriate 'courses' schema under 'DemoSchema' Controller Service
Used appropriate regex for .csv to .parquet file extension
Processors Config : ReadCSV : schema name, avro.schema schema registry : DemoSchema WriteParquet : schema name, avro.schema
